events.description: White Sox challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Tim Anderson grounds out, second baseman Jordan Westburg to first baseman Ryan O'Hearn. 1 out
Andrew Benintendi lines out to shortstop Jorge Mateo. 2 outs
Luis Robert Jr. grounds out, shortstop Jorge Mateo to first baseman Ryan O'Hearn. 3 outs
